title: What is your opinion about S.F.S School in Ettumanoor, Kottayam, Kerala? - Quora

response.answer_text: I studied there for my +1 and +2. My opinion is that it is great school. The principal at the time was Fr. Binoy who was a very nice human and a good principal. Of course, you will be pushed to study more, but it has some of the best labs and teachers around. I studied during 2009–2010. I am not sure about the quality now. But during my time there, it was one of the best schools around. My batch had the MBBS entrance second rank holder as well as many other ranks. The school gives priority to your academics first.
One of the famous cbse school of Ettumanoor municipality They have great faculty They bring out the best from each student.SFS Public School is one of the top best cbse school in Kerala
